name: tweaks
description: common style/layout changes and custom code insertion. check out the [tweaks page](https://notion-enhancer.github.io/advanced/tweaks) for more.

options.label: css insert
options.tooltip: **upload a css file that will be applied to the notion client**

options.label: responsive columns breakpoint (px)
options.tooltip: the **width in pixels below which in-page columns are resized** to appear full-width to reduce content squishing

options.label: responsive columns breakpoint (%)
options.tooltip: the **percentage of the screen below which in-page columns are resized to appear full-width** to reduce content squishing

options.label: full width pages
options.tooltip: **decreases padding so every page appears full width**

options.label: wrap tables to page width
options.tooltip: **force horizontally scrollable tables to respect the width and padding of a page when they overflow**

options.label: snappy transitions
options.tooltip: enabling this **eliminates css animation time**, but will not prevent motion e.g. the sidebar popping out

options.label: hide default page icons
options.tooltip: hide **default (svg.page)** page icons, both in sidebar and opened pages, to save some space

options.label: condense bullet points
options.tooltip: **tighter line spacing between bullet point blocks**

options.label: accented links
options.tooltip: **links are shown by default with notion's blue colour or a theme's equivalent**

options.label: quote block quotation marks
options.tooltip: **wrap quote block content in large, decorative serif quotation marks**
